prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon that resembles three moles poking out of the earth.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of mole and dirt, showcasing its underground habitat.
Imagine a small, burrowing creature with a charming face and unique earth tones.
Generate a Pokemon that looks playful, with three heads and a love for digging.
Show me a Pokemon with a round shape, earthy colors, and a personality that suggests it's shy.
Make a unique Pokemon that thrives underground and has a trio of features on its head.
Give me a Pokemon that represents the essence of soil and has a cute, mole-like appearance.
